project.description: Build the new 4.14.98 kernel for arm64 bit environments configurations: pico-imx8mq / pico-imx8mm

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
CHANGELOG=changelog-kernel OUT_PATH64=/home/jenkins/build/kernel64
# setup the target directories [ -d ./modules ] && rm -fr ./modules/* || mkdir -p ./modules [ -d ${OUT_PATH64} ] && rm -fr ${OUT_PATH64}/* || mkdir -p ${OUT_PATH64}
# change log if [ "${GIT_COMMIT}" == "${GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT}" ]; then git log --oneline -1 > ./${CHANGELOG} else if git cat-file -e ${GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT} 2> /dev/null ; then git log --oneline ${GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT}..${GIT_COMMIT} > ./${CHANGELOG} else git log --oneline ${GIT_COMMIT} > ./${CHANGELOG} fi fi cp ./${CHANGELOG} ${OUT_PATH64}/
# patch imx8mq-pico.dtsi/imx8mq-edm.dtsi for 1G RAM (suppose to be for 1G RAM, but for the sack of uniformity, all dts are affected) sed -i 's|size = <0 0x3c000000>;|size = <0 0x06000000>;|g' ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/fsl-imx8mq.dtsi sed -i 's|size = <0 0x28000000>;|size = <0 0x06000000>;|g' ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/fsl-imx8mm.dtsi sed -i 's|size = <0 0x30000000>;|size = <0 0x06000000>;|g' ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/imx8mq-pico.dtsi sed -i 's|size = <0 0x30000000>;|size = <0 0x06000000>;|g' ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/imx8mq-edm.dtsi cat ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/fsl-imx8mq.dtsi cat ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/fsl-imx8mm.dtsi cat ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/imx8mq-pico.dtsi cat ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/imx8mq-edm.dtsi
# build 64bit imx8 soc . buildenv.sh 64 make distclean make tn_imx8_defconfig make -j10 Image dtbs modules make modules_install INSTALL_MOD_PATH=./modules tar cvf modules.tar ./modules
cp ./arch/arm64/boot/Image ${OUT_PATH64}/ cp ./arch/arm64/boot/dts/freescale/*{imx8m,pico,wand}*.dtb* ${OUT_PATH64}/ || : cp modules.tar ${OUT_PATH64}/
